Title: Email validates and submits
Pre-conditions: Home page loaded, input form visible
Steps:
1. Enter valid email
2. Click submit button
Expected Result: Thank you message and confirmation displayed.

Title: Diabled button after submit
Expected Result: Button disappears when thank you message displayed.
Notes:
Button disappear when Thank you
message displayed.

Title: Blank email blocked
Expected Result: Doesn’t submit. Shows an error for the email field.

Title: Invalid email blocked (missing @)
Expected Result: Doesn’t submit. Shows an invalid email error.
Notes:
Same error message as other
invalid emails. No Submit or reload.

Title: Invalid email blocked (missing domain)
Expected Result: Doesn’t submit. Shows an invalid email error.

Title: Leading or trailing spaces trim or reject
Expected Result:
Trims the spaces and submits, or blocks it 
with an email error.
Notes: Spaces trimmed the spaces on Submit.

Title: Duplicate email handling
Expected Result: Clean submit, Thank You dislplayed, email sent.

Title: Safari mobile submit success
Pre-conditions: Home page loaded, input form visible
Steps:
1. Enter valid email
2. Click submit button
Expected Result:
On iPhone Safari it submits successfully, shows same
success message as desktop. Nothing is hidden by keyboard.
Notes:
Thank you displayed, some behavior as
desktop application
